title: Anomaly Detection and Quality Classification using Random Forest and Z-Score Analytics
features: Designed and deployed an end‑to‑end anomaly detection pipeline using Random Forest and Z‑score analytics, achieving a 5% increase in accuracy and generating 1‑10% anomaly scores on Honeywell sensor data.

Implemented StandardScaler-based feature scaling with per‑class deviation metrics, automatically extracting the top 7 contributing features per anomaly to enhance interpretability and process insight.
Integrated the model, scaler, and statistics into a production‑ready Flask application, enabling real‑time anomaly detection and quality classification for industrial manufacturing data.
